TABLE.NAME: edwiserform
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of mod_edwiserform in a course.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the instance of the form.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the form to be shown. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this form instance.
